alert.note: Alert for Baca; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 2:31PM MDT until June 27 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 231 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of The Saunders Elevator, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
